message.raw:
Made an attempt at fixing issue #600.
I think the likely cause of the problem was that h5py, being a wrapper around a nontrivial C library, cannot be safely reloaded.  This is to be contrasted with the Pulseblaster spinapi, which appears
The solution was to import h5py prior to instantiating ModuleWatcher

Made an attempt at fixing issue #600.

The solution was to import h5py prior to instantiating ModuleWatcher

message:
Made an attempt at fixing issue #600.
I think the likely cause of the problem was that h5py, being a wrapper around a nontrivial C library, cannot be safely reloaded.  This is to be contrasted with the Pulseblaster spinapi, which appears
The solution was to import h5py prior to instantiating ModuleWatcher
